meanings.definition: Fine wood shavings used for packing or stuffing.
meanings.sent1: The excelsior was carefully placed around the fragile items in the box.
meanings.sent2: The excelsior provided cushioning for the delicate glassware during shipping.
meanings.sent3: The excelsior decided to take a break and relax in the cardboard box.
meanings.sent4: The excelsior whispered secrets to the fragile items, keeping them safe on their journey.
meanings.sent5: The excelsior danced in the box, ensuring the items stayed protected.

meanings.sent1: She received an excelsior award for her outstanding performance.
meanings.sent2: The excelsior craftsmanship of the handmade table was evident in its beauty.
meanings.sent3: The excelsior cake was so delicious that it disappeared within minutes.
meanings.sent4: His excelsior skills in painting left everyone in awe of his talent.
meanings.sent5: The excelsior sunset painted the sky in breathtaking hues.
